Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3150 SABRE DRIVE, SOUTHLAKE, Texas, 76092, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sabre holds the number-two share of global distribution system air bookings (40.9% as of the end of 2020 versus 38.8% in 2019; 2021 booking share was not provided). The travel solutions segment represented 89% of total 2021 revenue, split between distribution (two thirds of segment sales) and airline IT solutions (one third) revenue. The company also has a growing hotel IT solutions division (11% of revenue). Transaction fees, which are mosty tied to volume and not price, account for the bulk of sales and profits.

value.name: Garry R. Wiseman
value.title: Chief Technology & Product Officer, Executive VP
